title: Immortal Muse
description: This sweeping historical fantasy follows two immortals from the 1300s onward, as they chase one another across timeAn immortal Muse whose very survival depends on the creativity she nurtures within her lovers....Another immortal who feeds not on artistry but on pain and torment....A chase through time from 1300s Paris to contemporary New York, with two people bound together in enmity and fury....When magic and science are melded together, an array of the famous and infamous—from Bernini to Vivaldi, from Lavoisier and Robespierre to William Blake, from Gustav Klimt to Charlotte Salomon—will be caught up unawares in this ages-long battle....
author: Stephen Leigh
